0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Philippines Today skill keeps you updated on the latest news and happenings, as curated by GMA Integrated News. Open the skill on your Alexa-enabled device and ask Alexa to play your Flash Briefing.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
